# Terms of Service

Last updated: December 1, 2024

Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms") carefully before using Produciesta (the "App") operated by Intrusive Memory Productions ("we," "us," or "our"). By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the App. ## 1. License to Use ### Grant of License Subject to these Terms, we grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to download, install, and use the App for personal or commercial use on devices you own or control. ### Restrictions You may not: - Copy, modify, or distribute the App - Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the App - Rent, lease, lend, or sublicense the App - Remove any proprietary notices from the App - Use the App in violation of any applicable laws ## 2. Subscriptions ### Free Tier The App offers a free tier with limited features as described on our [Pricing page](/pricing). ### Pro Subscription The Pro subscription provides additional features including: - Unlimited voice generations - Premium voice library access - Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) feature - Priority support ### Pricing - Monthly: $4.99/month - Annual: $39.99/year Prices are in USD and may vary by region. Applicable taxes may apply. ### Billing - Subscriptions are billed through Apple's App Store - Payment is charged to your Apple ID account - Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled - Cancel anytime through your Apple ID subscription settings ### Free Trial If offered, free trials: - Convert to paid subscriptions at the end of the trial period - Can be cancelled at any time during the trial - Are limited to one per Apple ID ## 3. Refund Policy Subscriptions are processed by Apple. Refund requests must be made through Apple's refund process: 1. Go to [reportaproblem.apple.com](https://reportaproblem.apple.com) 2. Sign in with your Apple ID 3. Select the subscription purchase 4. Request a refund Apple's refund policies apply. We cannot process refunds directly. ## 4. User Content ### Your Content You retain all rights to: - Screenplays you import - Audio you generate - Any other content you create using the App ### Content Responsibility You are solely responsible for: - The content you import and create - Ensuring you have rights to use any content - Compliance with applicable copyright and intellectual property laws ### Content Restrictions You agree not to use the App to: - Create content that infringes on others' intellectual property - Generate audio that impersonates real individuals without consent - Produce illegal, harmful, or offensive content - Violate any applicable laws or regulations ## 5. Third-Party Services ### Voice Generation Services The App uses AI voice generation services. When using these services: - Text is processed by the voice service provider - The provider's terms and conditions apply - We are not responsible for third-party service availability or performance ### ElevenLabs (BYOK) If you connect your own ElevenLabs API key: - You are responsible for your ElevenLabs account and charges - ElevenLabs' terms of service apply to your use - We are not responsible for ElevenLabs service issues ## 6. Intellectual Property ### Our Property The App and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Intrusive Memory Productions and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. ### Trademarks "Produciesta" and our logo are trademarks of Intrusive Memory Productions. You may not use these marks without our written permission. ## 7. Disclaimer of Warranties THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO: - MERCHANTABILITY - FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE - NON-INFRINGEMENT - ACCURACY OR RELIABILITY OF RESULTS We do not warrant that: - The App will be uninterrupted or error-free - Defects will be corrected - The App is free of viruses or harmful components ## 8. Limitation of Liability TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IN NO EVENT SHALL INTRUSIVE MEMORY PRODUCTIONS BE LIABLE FOR: - Indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages - Loss of profits, data, use, or goodwill - Service interruption or computer damage OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US IN THE TWELVE (12) MONTHS PRIOR TO THE CLAIM. Some jurisdictions do not allow limitation of liability, so these limitations may not apply to you. ## 9. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Intrusive Memory Productions from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising from: - Your use of the App - Your violation of these Terms - Your violation of any third-party rights - Content you create using the App ## 10. Termination ### By You You may stop using the App at any time by: - Deleting the App from your devices - Cancelling any active subscriptions ### By Us We may terminate or suspend your access immediately, without notice, for: - Breach of these Terms - Conduct we deem harmful to other users or us - Legal requirements ### Effect of Termination Upon termination: - Your license to use the App ends - You must delete all copies of the App - Provisions that should survive termination will survive ## 11. Changes to Terms We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes by: - Posting updated Terms on this page - Updating the "Last updated" date - Notifying you in the App Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms. ## 12. General Provisions ### Governing Law These Terms are governed by the laws of [State/Country], without regard to conflict of law principles. ### Dispute Resolution Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved through binding arbitration, except where prohibited by law. ### Severability If any provision of these Terms is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain in effect. ### Entire Agreement These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the App. ### Waiver Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms does not constitute a waiver of that right or provision. ## 13. Contact Us For questions about these Terms: **Email**: support@produciesta.app **Mail**: Intrusive Memory Productions [Address]
